section.title: View
section.para:
The view resource is meant to provide the user a turn-key view that may be used as is throughout the application. The view provided will be setup with the following:
Majisti's application library views scripts
Majisti and MajistiX' extensions view helpers added to the pluginloader
ZendX JQuery view helpers added to the pluginloader
The application's library view helpers under ${majisti.app.path}/library/views/helpers
The application's library scripts under ${majisti.app.path}/library/views/scripts
The Zend_View registry key will be setup with that view
The doctype will be set to XHTML1_STRICT.
